Package main.java.matrices

Class GMatrix<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.matrices.GMatrix<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>, Matrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CMatrix
    public class GMatrix<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix, java.lang.Iterable<T>
    This iterator represents a generic matrix that can contain any object. This allows for general and basic matrix functionality for any given object type.
    Author:
    Joshua McDonagh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GMatrix()
      Constructor method which creates an empty matrix.
      GMatrix​(int height, int width)
      Constructor method which creates a matrix with a set height and width.
      GMatrix​(T[][] values)
      Constructor method which creates a matrix from a 2D array.
